title: sArasa dala nayana
sahitya:
sArasa daLa nayana sankaTa haraNa harE gOvinda mAm pAhi


anupallavi

 nIrajAsanAdi pUjitAnga shrI ramAntaranga shubhAnga 
murahara abhaya prada mukunda yAdava kula bhUSaNa mAdhava


caraNam   mAghamAsOtsava prabhAva mAnita guruguha vandita bhava 
gOkula janapAla gOpikA manOhara gOvardhanadhara
